rules_text:
Affinity for Clues [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Clue you control.)[/i]
Ward {3}
rules_text2: Create a Clue token for each creature you control with power or toughness 1 or less. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Loch ness monster

Mechanical Uniqueness — Adventure, affinity for something other than artifacts, unique frame

**Designer’s note: Changed the adventure to just check for power or toughness 1 instead of 1/1 creatures — gives it more hits in the set, as I was having trouble making this work in limited
